name: Music_11.wav
keywords: ['folk music', 'rubab', 'male voice', 'slow tempo', 'emotional song', 'low quality audio', 'violin', 'accordion']
caption: This folk song features a male voice singing the main melody in an emotional mood. This is accompanied by an accordion playing fills in the background. A violin plays a droning melody. There is no percussion in this song. This song can be played at a Central Asian classical concert.
